Hi all,

Today I've downloaded the new Romfarer mod for 0.21, but I ran into a minor problem.

One of the best things for me is the night vision screen. Sadly it's the only thing that doesn't seem to work. I do have night vision in the target cam however, but the buttons in the menu screen (normal - night - invert) don't respond.

If anyone knows how to solve this, please tell me.

[This is a cross post. I responded in the Romfarer showcase thread because I was guided to there by the Spaceport. After that, I noticed this thread.]
Thread can be closed. Romfarer already responded.
